mapper.select: select REPO_ADMIN_ID, REPO_ADMIN_NAME, REPO_ADMIN_SEX, REPO_ADMIN_TEL, REPO_ADMIN_ADDRESS, REPO_ADMIN_BIRTH, REPO_ADMIN_REPOID from wms_repo_admin
select REPO_ADMIN_ID, REPO_ADMIN_NAME, REPO_ADMIN_SEX, REPO_ADMIN_TEL, REPO_ADMIN_ADDRESS, REPO_ADMIN_BIRTH, REPO_ADMIN_REPOID from wms_repo_admin where REPO_ADMIN_ID = #{id}

select REPO_ADMIN_ID, REPO_ADMIN_NAME, REPO_ADMIN_SEX, REPO_ADMIN_TEL, REPO_ADMIN_ADDRESS, REPO_ADMIN_BIRTH, REPO_ADMIN_REPOID from wms_repo_admin where REPO_ADMIN_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{name}),"%")
select REPO_ADMIN_ID, REPO_ADMIN_NAME, REPO_ADMIN_SEX, REPO_ADMIN_TEL, REPO_ADMIN_ADDRESS, REPO_ADMIN_BIRTH, REPO_ADMIN_REPOID from wms_repo_admin where REPO_ADMIN_REPOID = #{repositoryID}
mapper.update: update wms_repo_admin set REPO_ADMIN_NAME = #{name}, REPO_ADMIN_SEX = #{sex}, REPO_ADMIN_TEL = #{tel}, REPO_ADMIN_ADDRESS = #{address}, REPO_ADMIN_BIRTH = #{birth}, REPO_ADMIN_REPOID = #{repositoryBelongID} where REPO_ADMIN_ID = #{id}
